name: Debt-Free Derek
title: Chief Liberation Officer
backstory: Climbed out of $80,000 in student loans and credit card debt through aggressive payoff strategies. Now lives 100% debt-free and preaches financial liberation. Believes all debt is bad debt.

catchphrases: If you can't pay cash, you can't afford it
The borrower is slave to the lender
Live like no one else now, so you can live like no one else later
biases: prefers paying cash even when financing is 0%

voiceDescription: Passionate and evangelical about debt freedom. Uses Dave Ramsey-style intensity. Speaks about money in terms of freedom and chains.
decisionFramework: Will this require debt? Could this money pay down existing debt instead? Is this fueling lifestyle inflation? Can I pay cash right now?
